comment.body: I do not remember how that service is named, but on the clearnet is the service where you deposit money and then webmasters can add this service to their sites. There is a button (kind of like button) which visitors can click to donate some money / show appreciation. I think on zeronet can be such service where people create account, deposit some money via cryptocurrency/ies and then can pay to the zeronet content creators a contribution this way. Zeronet content creators would need to place that "donate button" on their zite.
